original_title: Oh Yeah! The Return of Kool-Aid Man
overview: Some bad men are pushing a designer version of Kool Aid, and people are getting hurt.  The stakes are high as Kool Aid Man, goes undercover to stop the drug dealers, save the girl and quench your thirst.  See Kool Aid Man in butt kicking, kung fuâ€™ing, sugary, refreshing action as he burst through the walls to take back his city.
title: Oh Yeah! The Return of Kool-Aid Man
